DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study provide information regard potential factor underlie metabolic dysfunction , insulin resistance , loss muscle mass age muscle .
DOC.detailed_description: Study Objectives : 1 . To determine effect diet-induced weight loss without addition exercise mitochondrial biogenesis energetic capacity , cellular redox state insulin resistance . 2 . To determine effect diet-induced weight loss without addition exercise intramyocellular lipid profile . 3 . To determine effect diet-induced weight loss without exercise skeletal muscle protein mediate program autophagy either loss maintenance muscle mass .
DOC.criteria: 6580 year age Stable weight ( No Gain/Loss > 10 lbs 6 month ) Sedentary ( ≤ 1 continuous exercise/week ) Nonsmoker BMI ≥ 30 kg/m2 Resting Blood Pressure ≤ 150 millimeter mercury systolic ≤ 95 millimeter mercury diastolic Note Primary care physician/Cardiologist exercise clearance positive stress test symptom observe exercise test Must willing washout 14 day diabetes medication independent self blood glucose monitoring washout period ( diabetes ) Clinically significant cardiovascular disease include history myocardial infarction , within past year Peripheral Vascular Disease Hepatic , renal , muscular/neuromuscular , active hematologic/oncologic disease Clinically diminish pulse Presence bruits low extremity Previous history pulmonary emboli Peripheral Neuropathy
